name: Construction
primaryTexts: Either place 1 structure on a planet you control, or use the PRODUCTION ability of 1 of your space docks.
Place 1 structure on a planet you control.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 1 structure on a planet you control.

name: Warfare
primaryTexts: Perform a tactical action in any system without placing a command token, even if the system already has your command token in it: that system still counts as being activated. You may redistribute your command tokens before and after this action.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to use the Production abilities of the units in your home system. (This token is not placed in your home system)
